title: Notes by the Way; or, what I saw in my rambles
author: Higginson, H. Talbot.
snippet: About a mile and a-half to the east of Dunblane, the battle of Sheriffmuir, or Dunblane, was fought in 1715,between the Earl of Mar (for the Chevalier St. George, or the Pretender) and the royal forces under the Duke of Argyle, a stone, called"The Battle Stone," marking the scene of the conflict.
